name: The Alchimera
description:
You play a fierce little cat with magical abilities, who just defeated an evil alchemist. But instead of enjoying your well deserved freedom, you have to figure out how to save the town from an alchemical sewer monster, which threatens to come to life after the death of the alchemist.

Will you manage to defeate the alchimera or figure out, what they are after all?

One playthrough is only a few minutes, but has several different outcomes, depending on what you do.

This short game was created during inkJam 2021 and is a sequel to the short game "The Ingredient", which was created for inkJam 2019
